com.box.boxandroidlibv2.activities

Class FolderNavigationActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.box.boxandroidlibv2.activities.FolderNavigationActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FilePickerActivity

    public class FolderNavigationActivity
extends Activity
    This class is used to navigate a users folder tree.
    Author:
    dcung

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FolderNavigationActivity.Controller 
      protected class  FolderNavigationActivity.FolderNavigationBoxListItemAdapter
      BoxListItemAdapter intended for navigating a folder.
      protected class  FolderNavigationActivity.FolderNavigationReceiver
      Receiver used to receive broadcasts related to folder navigation.

        public static Intent getLaunchIntent(Context context,
                     java.lang.String folderId,
                     BoxAndroidOAuthData oauth,
                     java.lang.String clientId,
                     java.lang.String clientSecret)
        Create an intent to launch an instance of this activity to navigate folders.
        Parameters:
        context - current context.
        folderId - folder id to navigate.
        oauth - oauth data for client.
        clientId - client id
        clientSecret - client secret
        Returns:
        an intent to launch an instance of this activity.
